entry.title: BUtils.net Minecraft Server Release
entry.summary: The BUtils.net Minecraft network has been released today. Read this post to understand how it works.
entry.content:
The BUtils.net Minecraft network has been released today. Read this post to understand how it works.

ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ª Deutsche Version bei Read More

What is this?â€‹

You can join BUtils.net with the Minecraft version 1.19.3. Afterwards, you can use the chest to select or create servers.

You want to know more about BUtils.net? Continue reading here: BUtils.net Minecraft Server.

Giveawaysâ€‹

We will have giveaways on DerBanko's Twitch channel. Tune in and maybe you get lucky.

Was ist das?â€‹

entry.title: BUtils Wiki Release
entry.summary: Welcome to the official BUtils documentation and blog posts.
entry.content:
Welcome to the official BUtils documentation and blog posts.

ðŸ‡©ðŸ‡ª Deutsche Version bei Read More

Documentationâ€‹

In the documentation, you will have an updated overview about BUtils 5.

There are several categories regarding the BUtils Minecraft Challenge plugin, our Discord server and its shopping system and the BUtils.net Minecraft server.

News & Changelogsâ€‹

If there are any news regarding BUtils, you will have a blog post here. Additionally, there will be a short version of any news on our Discord server in the #news channel (currently only in German).

Questionsâ€‹

Feel free to ask questions to the BUtils team on our Discord server in the #support channel.

Dokumentationâ€‹

In der Dokumentation (derzeit nur in Englisch verfÃ¼gbar) findest Du eine aktualisierte Ãœbersicht von BUtils 5.

Es gibt verschiedene Kategorien: BUtils Minecraft Challenge Plugin, Discord-Server und das Shopping-System und BUtils.net Minecraft Server.

Neuigkeiten & Changelogsâ€‹

Wenn es Neuigkeiten Ã¼ber BUtils gibt, wird es hier einen Blogpost geben. ZusÃ¤tzlich kannst Du eine kurze Version der Neuigkeiten auf unserem Discord Server im #news Channel finden.

Fragenâ€‹

Auf unserem Discord-Server im #support Channel kannst Du Fragen an das BUtils Team stellen.
